name: Pick Me! (Dating Sim Demo)
description:
Make the right choices in order to woo one of your friends and hopefully not end up alone for another Valentines Day!

Character art by Red-Baby

*This game was originally developed to be downloaded and played on PC, and has been converted to an HTML format to make it easier for people to try out, and thus there may be some bugs caused by this format conversion. Know bugs: saving and loading will not work if the page is closed or refreshed, in-game exit buttons will simply cause the game to stop working.
